mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.concern_task_group_sid, t.concern_task_group_code, t.concern_task_group_name, t.status, t.plant_sid, t.plant_code, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys ,t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name,t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name , p.short_name as plant_name from s_man_produce_concern_task_group t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name AND t.client_id = t2.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t.updater_account = t3.user_name AND t.client_id = t3.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t.confirmer_account = t4.user_name AND t.client_id = t4.client_id LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant p ON t.plant_sid = p.plant_sid
mapper.select: select t.concern_task_sid, t.concern_task_code, t3.concern_task_name, t5.end_status, t5.manufacture_order_code from s_man_produce_concern_task_group_item t left join s_man_produce_concern_task t3 on t3.concern_task_sid=t.concern_task_sid left join ( select t4.concern_task_sid, t4.end_status, t4.manufacture_order_code from s_man_manufacture_order_concern_task t4 where t4.manufacture_order_code = #{manufactureOrderCode} ) t5 on t5.concern_task_sid=t.concern_task_sid where t.concern_task_group_sid = #{concernTaskGroupSid} order by t.sort asc
